verses.text: I said, I will give attention \w to|strong="H1732"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* ways, so \w that|strong="H1732"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* tongue \w may|strong="H1732"\w* do no wrong; I will keep \w my|strong="H1732"\w* mouth under control, while \w the|strong="H1732"\w* sinner \w is|strong="H1732"\w* before me.

\w I|strong="H5704"\w* made no \w sound|strong="H6310"\w*, \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* no \w word|strong="H6310"\w*, \w even|strong="H5704"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* good; \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w was|strong="H6310"\w* moved \w with|strong="H6310"\w* sorrow.
My heart \w was|strong="H3511"\w* burning in my breast; while I \w was|strong="H3511"\w* deep in thought \w the|strong="H2896"\w* fire \w was|strong="H3511"\w* lighted; then I said with my tongue,

Lord, \w give|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H1696"\w* knowledge \w of|strong="H3820"\w* \w my|strong="H1696"\w* end, \w and|strong="H3820"\w* \w of|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* measure \w of|strong="H3820"\w* \w my|strong="H1696"\w* days, \w so|strong="H1696"\w* \w that|strong="H0784"\w* \w I|strong="H3820"\w* \w may|strong="H3820"\w* see how feeble \w I|strong="H3820"\w* am.

\w You|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w made|strong="H3045"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* no longer than \w a|strong="H3068"\w* hand's measure; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w years|strong="H3117"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* nothing \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* eyes; truly, \w every|strong="H3117"\w* man \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w but|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* breath. (Selah.)

\w Truly|strong="H0389"\w*, \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* goes \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w way|strong="H3605"\w* \w like|strong="H0120"\w* \w an|strong="H5414"\w* image; \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* troubled \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* purpose: \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w makes|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* great store \w of|strong="H3117"\w* wealth, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w has|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* knowledge \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H0120"\w* get \w it|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w now|strong="H1980"\w*, Lord, \w what|strong="H4310"\w* \w am|strong="H1980"\w* \w I|strong="H3045"\w* waiting \w for|strong="H3045"\w*? \w my|strong="H3045"\w* hope \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w you|strong="H3045"\w*.

Make \w me|strong="H4100"\w* free from all \w my|strong="H6258"\w* sins; \w do|strong="H4100"\w* not \w let|strong="H6258"\w* \w me|strong="H4100"\w* \w be|strong="H0136"\w* shamed by \w the|strong="H6258"\w* man \w of|strong="H0136"\w* evil behaviour.

\w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w was|strong="H3605"\w* quiet, \w and|strong="H3605"\w* kept \w my|strong="H3605"\w* mouth shut; \w because|strong="H6588"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w had|strong="H7760"\w* \w done|strong="H3605"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w*.

\w No|strong="H3808"\w* \w longer|strong="H3808"\w* \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* hand \w be|strong="H3808"\w* hard \w on|strong="H3808"\w* \w me|strong="H3808"\w*; \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am wasted \w by|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* blows \w of|strong="H6310"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* hand.

\w By|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* weight \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* wrath \w against|strong="H5921"\w* man's sin, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* glory \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* form \w is|strong="H3027"\w* wasted \w away|strong="H5493"\w*; truly every man \w is|strong="H3027"\w* \w but|strong="H0589"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* breath. (Selah.)

\w Let|strong="H0389"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* prayer come \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* ears, O Lord, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* give attention \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* cry, make \w an|strong="H0376"\w* answer \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* weeping: \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* time \w here|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H0376"\w* short \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* little time \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* gone, \w like|strong="H0376"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* fathers.

\w Let|strong="H0408"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* wrath \w be|strong="H0408"\w* \w turned|strong="H0413"\w* \w away|strong="H5973"\w* \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w so|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H0408"\w* comforted, \w before|strong="H0413"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* go \w away|strong="H5973"\w* \w from|strong="H8085"\w* here, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* become \w nothing|strong="H0408"\w*.
